attributes.action: Scrap or ask people to pay half fare with the national bus pass scheme
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Wilts and Dorset and other bus companies are having to scrap some if not nearly all vital bus services because you the government are not paying the bus companies like my favourite bus company Wilts and Dorset, though you the government say you are putting alot of money into bus companies like Wilts and Dorset when you quite clearly are not put alot of money into bus companies like Wilts and Dorset except Brighton and Hove Bus Company which does really well under the national bus pass scheme, while other bus companies like Wilts and Dorset do not.
